verbose_text: Overexpression of the histone methyltransferase that methylates this residue on H3, PRMT4 / CARM1, into individual blastomeres not only induced upregulation of Nanog and Sox2, but also resulted in an almost complete allocation of these blastomeres into the ICM compartment.
evidence: histone methyltransferase that methylates this residue on H3
